column3: Tourism;PHNOM PENH: The Ministry of Health has announced a new case of COVID-19 in Kompong Trach district

column7: Kampot province was found to be infected.------The Cambodian man was a passenger returning from the Philippines to Cambodia on a flight from the Republic of Korea at 2200 pm on May 20
